meaningMnemonic: A <radical>gold</radical> <radical>name</radical> on this piece of wood is the <kanji>inscription</kanji> that shows the artist's signature.
readingMnemonic: The inscription is a name written on something, right? Remember the kanji for "name"? It is 名, and it shares the reading with this kanji as well, making both names <reading>めい</reading>.
